channel.title: lisp on My Point of View
channel.description: Recent content in lisp on My Point of View

item.title: I Built a Lisp Compiler
item.description: I’m very proud to announce the completion of my first programming language compiler! Malcc is an incremental and ahead-of-time lisp compiler written in C. This is the story of my progress over the years and what I learned in the process. An alternate title for this post is: “How to Write a Compiler in Ten Years or Less” (There’s a TL;DR at the bottom if you don’t care about the backstory.
